title: The Secret of Chateau de Moreau v2.1 Android
description:
The Secret of Chateau de Moreau v2.1.4
Requirements: Android 2.0+
Overview: Most people will make the natural association between The Secret Chateau de Moreau and the Phoenix Wright series, with its hunt for evidence and questioning scenarios. But in all honesty, the game is far more similar to the Professor Layton franchise, as well as a much lesser known Nintendo DS title called Hotel Dusk: Room 215. They do a really fine job representing the game styles presented.
